entry.title: A Crawler for Jiandan - JDCrawler
entry.content:
There is a famous website in China called jiandan.net, and there is a section for geeks where you can find many pictures hosted on SinaAppEngine. I am tired of browsing the pictures page by page so I decided to wrote a web crawler to download all the pictures to my local computer. :)

You can see a demo below

What it actually do is :

  1. parse the image link
  2. get the source of the image and fetch the meta data
  3. store the images in ./image folder and sort them by page number
  4. use a status indicator to show the process
  5. use a user_agent_list to dynamically change the user agent, avoiding the 503 forbid error caused by rapidly access the sina app engine image database

I have open sourced this crawler and you can find the source code on JDCrawler.

Enjoy.

entry.title: Opensourced Two Projects
entry.content:
After almost three months work, I have finished all the solutions for leetcode and lintcode. All the solutions are optimal and are mine from the internet, with reference attached.

entry.title: Cracking the Coding Interview
entry.content:
I start to write code for the book Cracking the Coding Interview today, and I will post my code to my Github page daily to keep track. You are welcomed to fork.

I implement the programs in Java language, and after I finish all the code, I will provide Python and C++ implement.
